```{r, echo=FALSE, layout="l-screen"}
paths <- c(
  "_projects/2022/100481925/images/alternative_bar.png",
  "_projects/2022/100489635/100489635_files/figure-html5/unnamed-chunk-13-1.png",
  "_projects/2022/100383017/100383017_files/figure-html5/unnamed-chunk-29-1.png",
  "_projects/2022/100483607/Grafico_Definitivo.png"
)

caption <- sapply(strsplit(paths, "/"), function(path) {
  rmd <- paste0(paste0(c(path[1:3], path[3]), collapse="/"), ".Rmd")
  yml <- rmarkdown::yaml_front_matter(rmd)
  url <- substring(paste0(c(path[1:3], "index.html"), collapse="/"), 2)
  paste0("<a href='", url, "' style='color:white'>", yml$title, "</a>, by ", yml$author)
})

pixture::pixgallery(paths, caption=caption, type="box")
```
